name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 21, a netizen claimed to be a doctoral student at the School of Literature of Renmin University of China, and reported his supervisor Wang Guiyuan by real name for sexual harassment and forced indecency in 2022. 
On the morning of July 22, Renmin University of China responded: We attach great importance to it, set up a working group at the first time, and carried out investigation and verification overnight.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 19, Shaoshan, Hunan. A tourist collected soil from Mao Zedong's former residence, but was stopped by security guards, "What are you doing? If everyone collects a little, it will be gone."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A village director in Dingzhou, Hebei, was prosecuted for falsely accusing villagers and escaped during bail.
On December 29, 2016, Zhang, then the village director of Zhaozhuang Village, instructed others to smash his car and falsely accused Mr. Li of doing it. The police eventually confirmed Mr. Li's innocence, and Zhang was prosecuted by the procuratorate for suspected false accusation and framing. During the trial of the case, Zhang, who was still on bail, escaped and has not been caught yet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 21, Shuozhou, Shanxi. It was reported online that a customer had a conflict with a vendor over the price when buying melons, and then the customer stabbed the vendor with a knife.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 21, Baoji, Shaanxi. Rescuers entered the garage. Netizens found many handprints on the walls and ceiling of the garage. Rescuers said "It's hard to imagine how much suffering the trapped people have endured"
https://t.co/43SdZV6QXI

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Third Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee: Promote the gradual delay of the statutory retirement age reform in a voluntary and flexible manner in a steady and orderly manner.
Netizens responded that "it's hard to find a job at the age of 35" and "college students can't find a job"
As of now, the Weibo topic #修改退退# has been deleted by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 21 (Released) Shenzhen, Guangdong. Students from Zhongjia Vocational and Technical School were exposed online for bullying a homeless man. The video showed that the man was resting on a chair in a fast food restaurant, and several students came up to him and knocked on the table, pulled the homeless man's clothes, and then poured milk on him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Chengdu, Sichuan, a statement of "Apology Statement from Tianfu Aviation and Tourism Vocational College" was circulated online. The statement stated that according to the school's annual plan, new employee recruitment will be carried out in the summer of 2024. As of July 14, 3,500 resumes were received. After written tests, re-examinations, interviews, and trial lectures, 120 people still passed the re-examination, reaching more than 20 times the actual recruitment needs, of which 30% are masters and doctors, and there are also doctors from Tsinghua University who participated in the interview. The recruitment software shows that the school is recruiting deputy deans of secondary colleges with an annual salary of 80,000-150,000 yuan/year. In response, netizens replied: The employment pressure is really too great now. Public information shows that Tianfu New District Aviation and Tourism Vocational College is a full-time general college with aviation and tourism majors approved by the Sichuan Provincial People's Government and approved by the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China. It is directly under the management of the Sichuan Provincial Department of Education.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
China and the Philippines reach a temporary supply agreement on Ren'ai Reef

On July 22, 2024, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Philippines announced that they had reached a temporary supply arrangement on the situation in Ren'ai Reef (called Ayunjin Reef in the Philippines) in the South China Sea. The agreement allows the Philippines to deliver humanitarian supplies to its warships stranded on the reef to ease tensions.

The Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs stated in a statement that China firmly safeguards the sovereignty of Ren'ai Reef and requires the Philippines to tow away the stranded warship and restore it to its original state. The statement also emphasized that the Philippines needs to notify China before delivering supplies and allow on-site verification, otherwise China will resolutely prevent any attempt to build fixed facilities.

At the same time, Teresita Daza, a spokesperson for the Philippine Ministry of Foreign Affairs, said that the Philippines will continue to safeguard its rights in the South China Sea and did not agree to China's requirements for pre-supply notification and on-site verification. She pointed out that the principles and methods in the agreement were reached after detailed consultations...
fullContent:
中菲就仁爱礁达成临时补给协议

2024年7月22日，中华人民共和国外交部和菲律宾外交部宣布，就南中国海仁爱礁（菲律宾称阿云津礁）的局势达成了一项临时性补给安排。此次协议允许菲律宾向其坐滩在该礁的军舰运送人道主义生活物资，以缓解紧张局势。

中国外交部声明指出，中方坚决维护仁爱礁主权，要求菲律宾拖走坐滩军舰，恢复原状。声明中还强调，菲律宾需在运送物资前通报中方，并允许现场核查，否则中国将坚决阻止任何试图建设固定设施的行为。

与此同时，菲律宾外交部发言人特雷西塔·达扎表示，菲律宾将继续维护其在南中国海的权利，并未同意中方关于补给前通报和现场核查的要求。她指出，协议中的原则和方法是在详尽磋商后达成的，并不妥协于中国的要求。

自去年以来，中菲在南中国海的主权争端多次引发冲突，其中阿云津礁成为争议焦点。最近一次冲突发生在6月17日，菲律宾指责中国船只导致八名菲律宾军人受伤，中方则指责菲律宾运补船非法靠近中方船只。这一临时协议的达成，意在缓解当前紧张局势，推动南海和平稳定。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 21, Harbin, Heilongjiang. Netizens filmed the current situation of the town "Yimianpo Town". The video shows that some houses on the main street of the town are dilapidated and uninhabited, and the shops along the street are all closed. Netizens said "The town is almost becoming a deserted town"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the first half of 2023, China's online retail sales reached 7.16 trillion yuan
Data released by the Ministry of Commerce recently showed that in the first half of 2024, the national online retail sales reached 7.1 trillion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 9.8%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Communiqué of the Third Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee:
We must coordinate development and security, implement various measures to prevent and resolve risks in key areas such as real estate, local debt, and small and medium-sized financial institutions, strictly implement safety production responsibilities, organize a social security risk prevention and control network, and effectively maintain social stability. We must strengthen public opinion guidance and effectively prevent and resolve ideological risks. We must effectively respond to external risk challenges, lead global governance, and actively create a favorable external environment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 21 (Released) Shanghai. The traffic police first took the delivery boy's mobile phone and refused to return it, then stepped forward and pulled out the key from the boy's electric bike. The boy immediately got angry and knocked the traffic police to the ground, shouting "Do you have to force me to rebel? Are you forcing me?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Petition and stability maintenance in Shaanxi led to a bloody incident with one death and one injury: the mentally ill patient was sentenced to 10 years in prison, while the stability maintenance personnel were given a light sentence of 4 years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In response to the online report on the evening of July 21 that Wang Guiyuan, a teacher at Renmin University of China, was suspected of misconduct, Renmin University of China announced that the report was true.
